translations: adj.有过失的；怠忽的；拖欠债务的
n.流氓；行为不良的人；失职者

sentences.sentence: Someone would need to pay the $180,000 delinquent tax note at auction.
sentences.translation: 有人需要在拍卖中支付18万美元的拖欠税款。

sentences.sentence: Lenders of all stripes clearly prefer to foreclose on delinquent borrowers.
sentences.translation: 对于逾期不还贷的借款人，形形色色的放款人明显青睐没收他们的房产。

sentences.sentence: That would allow the loan to be classed as "current" rather than "delinquent".
sentences.translation: 这样起码他们可以把贷款归类为“还贷中”，而不是“拖欠中”。
